title: too many auto leveling bots in ARAM
body:
i have sent an e-mail about it before though, still there are many bots.
what i figured out is their summoner's name is mostly 'somethingz' so, like ~~~~~z
AND they buy shoes first, no potion.
i mean not all people buying shoes first are bot, BUT BOTS BUY SHOES FIRST.
anyways, they make people who are enjoying aram get mad.
please help with this.
i get really angry.
